mean_en: to make a system, methods, etc. more modern and more suitable for use at the present time; to start using modern equipment, ideas, etc.
sentence: Repairing old houses is an important step to modernize our city.
sentence_trans: 修缮老旧房屋是城市现代化进程中的重要一步。
word_etyma: modern现代的 + ize动词后缀 → modernize（使）现代化
